DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to assess the effect of an individualized intervention based on cell phones to improve glycemic control in patients with type 2 diabetes attending Epidemiology Research Unit in Cuernavaca, Morelos. Mexico
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of an Intervention Based on Cell Phones
DOC.detailed_description: In this study before randomization, the participants received workshops on diet, physical activity, glycemic index of foods. BanduraÂ´s theoretical model was used in the voice messages sent to the intervention group.
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes mellitus > 10 years Glycated hemoglobin >7% Take insulin regularly Pregnant woman Woman who expected to be pregnant the next 6 months 24 hrs creatinine < 30 ml/minute
